name: Czesalaw Mialosz
story: Czesalaw grew up in a small village in Poland. He always wanted to become a soldier to defend his country against external threats. After completing his military training, he quickly climbed the ranks due to his hard work and dedication. He is now a respected sergeant and commands his team with precision and empathy. His family is the most important thing to him and he hopes to return home to them soon.
